content: NUS Skip to content Shape Your Future with NUS MSBA Discover more about NUS MSBA Discover more about NUS MSBA Elevate Your Business Acumen with Analytics Excellence Discover More About NUS MSBA NUS MSc in Business Analytics (MSBA) wins the 2025 UPS George D. Smith Prize Recognised globally for excellence in analytics education See what sets us apart Be A Catalyst of Digital Transformation with NUS MSBA. Advance your career as data savvy business leaders with Asia’s top Master of Science in Business Analytics (MSBA) programme, co-designed by NUS Business School and NUS Computing.Dive into an immersive industrial learning experience designed to help you excel in the competitive world of business analytics and learn about topics such as LLMs, GenAI, deep learning and more. Available Choosing the NUS MSBA programme is a significant step towards transforming your personal and professional future. We offer a range of merit-based scholarships to support your journey to success. Find Out More Looking to advance your career in the field of business analytics? Join the NUS MSBA programme and tap into our extensive network of over 100 industry partners. Gain invaluable real-world experience and build connections within your desired industry domains. Many of our NUS MSBA alumni have successfully transitioned to careers with our partner companies. Apply to NUS MSBA Student Testimonials I actually feel that at the end of the day, we are not just developing tech people here. We are actually training the next generation of change makers, leaders, problem solvers — I think that is the real value of the NUS MSBA. It is not just about being technical, it is actually taking the tech, the business side, the people side, melding them together right and coming up with a great solution. I think that’s what’s unique about this programme. Gino Martelli Tiu NUS MSBA Graduate Class of 2022 The NUS MSBA programme was instrumental in equipping me with the necessary skills and knowledge to transition into a data science career. The programme’s emphasis on practical application through real-world projects was invaluable, as this prepared me to confidently apply my skills in a real-world setting. The unique blend of business acumen, technical proficiency, and strong industry partnerships sets the programme apart, making it a major contributor to developing the next generation of change-makers, critical thinkers, and leaders. Swetha Narayanan NUS MSBA Graduate Class of 2020 My first choice for a school was clear. With its strong industry partnerships in Singapore, a hands-on curriculum and consistent ranking among the world’s best, NUS was the perfect university for me to select my course from. Rachel Sng NUS MSBA Graduate Class of 2022 I wanted to become a specialist who can analyse and extract useful information from data. That is what prompted me to embark on the NUS MSBA programme. To me, the MSBA offers me the best of both worlds – the networking and soft skills one would gain from an MBA, and the hands-on and technical rigour of a computing programme. Vincent Lee NUS MSBA Graduate Class of 2018 NUS MSBA has given me an opportunity for extensive growth through close collaboration with people from different industriesI was able to sharpen my analytical skills, as well as develop useful interpersonal skills by communicating my thoughts with confidence and clarity. Tang Han NUS MSBA Graduate Class of 2019 The MSBA programme has been a powerful stepping stone for me. The classroom learnings, capstone project and participating in competitions such as the 2020 NUS-EMC Innovation Challenge has empowered me to fulfil my career aspirations. Li Fengzi NUS MSBA Graduate Class of
